name: Mega.nz Bot
description: Simple Telegram Bot to download files from Mega.nz

AUTH_USERS.description: Telegram Ids Of Auth Users, Only they can use this bot. Separate them by space!

IS_PUBLIC_BOT.description: Set this to 'True' If you want to set Download Function as Public. Default to 'False' !

LOGS_CHANNEL.description: Make a private channel and forward a message from that channel to @ChannelidHEXbot and Get this. Not Mandatory

MEGA_EMAIL.description: Fill this if you want to use your own Mega Account. This is your Mega account Email!

MEGA_PASSWORD.description: Fill this if you want to use your own Mega Account. This is your Mega account Password!
